You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: This image shows a baseball game in progress with a batter preparing to hit the ball, a catcher ready to receive the pitch, and an umpire overseeing the play. The players are in the midst of a pitch, highlighted by the positioning of the umpire and the catcher's readiness. The scene is outdoors with the audience stands visible in the background, suggesting a professional or semi-professional level of play. The clarity of the image, along with the action captured, suggests it is taken at a significant moment of the game. No specific personal information is disclosed about the players or the teams.
